name: HSP_BKT_CLM_ICN
description: This table holds information of claim override internal control number (ICN) on Hospital Liability Buckets (HLB) for Resolute Hospital Billing.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLM_OVERRIDE_ICN
columns.description: This column stores the claim override internal control number.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_USR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier of the user who edited the claim override internal control number.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_IGN_YN
columns.description: This column stores the "ignore all" override flag for the claim override internal control number.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_CMNT
columns.description: This column stores the comment for the claim override internal control number.
